[bq="Dave33333"]So, I guess I rant... Then stop, and listen to another weird post...

Dono had offend multiple users, it pissed me off, I go and be Donald Trump, tell the damn truth, she gets pissed, push's my limits, I push her back, response? Asshole, my reply, Jackass. ~Maybe Jackasshole...~ She needs to learn that she can't be offending people like that, even me, ~I don't like n00bs, she said...~ Then people call me annoying, well, I give you a very special middle finger, I only did it cause I was board, I'm planning to change my profile pic to Donald Trump, and wait for forgiveness, and keep being a Trump...[/bq]
Hey, Dono is having a a very hard life. If you know how is Dono's real life, you will understand why he acts like that.
Also Dono is a dude

[/bq]

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b3f73f6368725ee900391a#post_55b3f73f6368725ee900391a
Yeah..........
About that, I had a _little_ problem.
I think I accidentaly donated all of my money. I didn't checked out that the fucking dollar was supe expensive and all my money just went to your fundraiser. 

But the real problem is that I only had 300 pesos in the bank. How much is 25 dollars?
Well is like 406 pesos, so that means I haven't donated all the money actually. I need to put more money in the bank so you can receive the full donation.

tldr: I donated more money that I could give and I'm indebted with your fundraiser.

Woah, woah, wait, what? Let me look into that. Oh, Jesus, dude. I'm so sorry. 

The conversion rate: 1 Mexican Peso equals 0.061 US Dollars.

topics.body: Now I feel terrible. I can't go to a grieving family and say "hey, that money in your fundraiser, I need some of it back". But by the same token, I can't just take your money either.

The story isn't dead, it just finished.
